markets.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Toni Kroos is the Player of the Tournament for Euro 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If no Player of the Tournament is awarded for Euro 2024 by July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from UEFA Euro 2024, including footage of the games, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
markets.question: Will Toni Kroos be Player of the Tournament for Euro 2024?

markets.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if any player other than Toni Kroos, Kylian Mbappe, Jude Bellingham, Harry Kane, Phil Foden, Cristiano Ronaldo, Rodri, Lamine Yamal, Cody Gakpo, Fabian Ruiz, Dani Olmo, Xavi Simons, Bukayo Saka or N'golo Kante is the Player of the Tournament for Euro 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If no Player of the Tournament is awarded for Euro 2024 by July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes".

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from UEFA Euro 2024, including footage of the games, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
